full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
============================

### Tender Reference and Details

* **Reference Number:** cb-800-32340213
* **Amendment Number:** 6
* **Solicitation Number:** ISEDNPP20231108
* **Publication Date:** 2023-10-25
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-11-08T14:00:00
* **Amendment Date:** 2023-11-08
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-11-15
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2024-03-31
* **Tender Status:** Expired

### Tender Description

**Request for Supply Arrangement**

The Innovation, Science and Economic Development Canada (ISED) invites bidders to submit a bid for the supply of down-converters under the Supply Arrangement (SA) series E60HN-16ELEC (category 1.32 RF Microwave and Waveguide).

**Scope of Work**

* Deliver the goods listed in Annex "A" to the Certification and Engineering Bureau, 3701 Carling Ave, Building 94, Ottawa, ON, K2H 8S2.
* The delivery date is 31 March 2024.
* Bidders must quote firm prices in Canadian dollars, DDP (destination), with freight charges included.

**Evaluation Criteria**

* Technical compliance to the requirements presented in the solicitation and at Annex "A".
* Technical compliance of equivalent (substitute) products offered.
* The lowest priced responsive bid on an aggregate basis will be recommended for award.

### Request for Interest

The following SA Holders have been invited to submit a proposal:

* ANIXTER CANADA INC (E60HN-16ELEC/001/HN)
* GRAYBAR CANADA E60HN-16ELEC/002/HN)
* NEDCO, DIVISION OF REXAL CANADA ELECTRICAL INC E60HN-16ELEC/003/HN)
* GIMPEL ELECTRIC SUPPLY LTD (E60HN-16ELEC/006/HN)
* GUILLEVIN INTERNATIONAL CO (E60HN-16ELEC/008/HN)
* LUMEN (E60HN-16ELEC/009/HN)
* TECHNET ELECTRONICS INC (E60HN-16ELEC/014/HN)
* SEIVAD CONNECTIONS INC (E60HN-16ELEC/015
